attributes.action: Public inquiry into pedophilia commitment by members of the establishment
attributes.additional_details:
We  demand a Judge led public inquiry to look into the allegations of child abuse and corruption in relation to this by politicians, police officers, civil servants  from 1970 to the current time.   It is only by looking at the full implication of what went on and examining whether a cover up took place that we will be able to protect children from this sort of behaviour in the future.  The inquiry should report on
what took place,
who knew it was taking place
why prosecutions were not made
It should make recommendations on cases that should be investigated with a view to prosecution.
It should make recommendations on future measures necessary to safeguard children from this sort of abuse
